trans-unit.source: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: 會公開，並更新儲存在 Active Directory 資料存放區中的成員資格使用者資訊。

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 物件用來代表 Active Directory 成員資格資料存放區中的單一成員資格使用者。

trans-unit.source: It exposes information about the membership user such as the e-mail address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password.
trans-unit.target: 它會公開電子郵件地址，例如成員資格使用者的相關資訊，並提供如變更或重設其密碼的能力的成員資格使用者的功能。

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: 每當應用程式設定為使用 Active Directory 資料存放區應用程式的成員資格提供者傳回 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 物件。

trans-unit.source: In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定的應用程式中使用不同的資料存放區，或在使用多個資料存放區的應用程式，您可以參考的基底類別， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Because the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object does not implement the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> properties, you must be prepared to handle the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> that is thrown when these members are accessed on an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object.
trans-unit.target: 因為 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 物件未實作<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>屬性，您必須準備處理<xref:System.NotSupportedException>ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 物件上存取這些成員時，會擲回。</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser class implements internal optimizations used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 類別實作所使用的內部最佳化<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>類別進行呼叫時的屬性更新數目降至最低<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: It also serializes the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> representation (available in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property) so that an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 它也會序列化<xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>表示法 (用於<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>屬性)，這樣 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 物件可以序列化和還原序列化，而不擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: A ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> methods or as part of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 物件由<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法或做為一部分<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>傳回<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is required by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user.
trans-unit.target: 所需的 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 物件<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>方法，當您想要更新現有的成員資格使用者的資訊。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 屬性對應到 Active Directory 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties and their default attribute mappings.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 屬性和其預設屬性對應。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default directory attribute|Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>|`securityIdentifier`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>|`userPrincipalName`|Yes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>|`comment`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>|`whenCreated`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>|`mail`|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>|`pwdLastSet`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>|none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>|`User-Account-Control` (AD)
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |預設目錄屬性 |可對應？ | |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>|`securityIdentifier`|否 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>|`userPrincipalName`|是，但必須是 userPrincipalName 或 sAMAccountName | |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>|`comment`|否 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>|`whenCreated`|否 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>|`mail`|是，但必須是 Unicode 字串類型的單一值屬性。 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a|不支援<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>。 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a|不支援<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>。 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>|`pwdLastSet`|否 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>| none，但如果使用密碼重設或重建的安全性問題答案都必須對應至屬性。 |是，但必須是 Unicode 字串類型的單一值屬性。 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>|`User-Account-Control` (AD)</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>|computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)
trans-unit.target: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled`(ADAM) |否 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>| 從計算`lockoutTime`和 AD 鎖定持續時間 (在 Windows 2000 上的 AD)</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(Windows Server 2003 上的 AD)

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>|If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(ADAM) |否 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>|如果因嘗試太多次不正確的密碼，以鎖定時，就會傳回鎖定時間屬性。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果鎖定因為太多錯誤密碼解答嘗試，儲存在所定義之屬性的值`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`傳回。

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果鎖定由於不正確的密碼和太多錯誤密碼嘗試，會傳回最新的日期/時間值。

trans-unit.source: If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.|No|
trans-unit.target: 如果帳戶未鎖定，則傳回 1/1/1753 為了與 SQL 相容。 |否 |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> object for a class that inherits the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref>繼承的類別物件<xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 建構函式不是從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref>類別具有指定的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Creating a new <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>物件不會對新的成員資格使用者物件的成員資格資料存放區。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將新的成員資格使用者加入至成員資格資料存放區中，使用<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object for the membership user added to the data store.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>加入至資料存放區的成員資格使用者物件。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method, although you can also pass an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> method to the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method as well.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>通常用於應用程式程式碼中建構物件<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>方法中，雖然您也可以傳遞<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>從傳回的物件<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>方法也。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>成員資格提供者實作的方式也常建構物件<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>成員資格使用者。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>成員資格使用者。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>成員資格使用者。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*> address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>的成員資格使用者的地址。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>成員資格使用者。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>成員資格使用者。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>成員資格使用者的值。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>成員資格使用者的值。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>成員資格使用者。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>成員資格使用者。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>成員資格使用者。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>成員資格使用者。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>成員資格使用者。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定成員資格使用者的應用程式特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: The Comment property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application.
trans-unit.target: 註解屬性可以用來儲存自訂成員資格使用者的應用程式特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 可以儲存的資訊數量`Comment` <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>所定義</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>的屬性

trans-unit.source: The Comment property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: 註解屬性對應到`Comment`預設 Active Directory 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能重新對應至另一個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""></xref> directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式特定資訊儲存在 Active Directory 成員<xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""></xref>目錄屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定成員資格使用者的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: The Email property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: 電子郵件屬性對應到`Mail`目錄屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以對應的 Web.config 檔案中，藉由設定`attributeMapUserName`屬性[設定檔 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的提供者項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f)的設定檔的項目。

trans-unit.source: The e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格使用者的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值，指出是否可以驗證成員資格使用者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> value for a membership user is checked during the call to <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>的呼叫期間會檢查成員資格使用者的值</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: If the IsApproved property returns `false`, the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IsApproved 屬性傳回`false`、<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>方法會傳回`false`即使提供的使用者名稱和密碼皆正確。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsApproved property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: IsApproved 屬性會對應到下列的 Active Directory 屬性的其中之一。

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Active Directory|`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory Application Mode|`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| |Active Directory |`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory 應用程式模式 |`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| 這個屬性不能重新對應至另一個屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以驗證使用者;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception in all cases
trans-unit.target: 擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>例外狀況，在所有情況下</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The LastActivityDate property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: LastActivityDate 屬性不支援<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>類別。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試取得或設定值一律會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 一律會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>例外狀況。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: any attempt to get or set the LastActivityDate property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試取得或設定 LastActivityDate 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>在所有情況下的例外狀況。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The LastLoginDate property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: LastLoginDate 屬性不支援<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>類別。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試取得或設定值一律會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 一律會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>例外狀況。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: any attempt to get or set the LastLoginDate property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試取得或設定 LastLoginDate 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 從 Active Directory 資料存放區取得成員資格使用者的使用者識別項。

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`.
trans-unit.target: ProviderUserKey 屬性會公開從成員資格資料來源以一般方式會輸入為識別項`object`。

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey class can be cast as a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
trans-unit.target: ProviderUserKey 類別可以轉換成<xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>物件。</xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: The user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 儲存成員資格使用者的 Active Directory 資料中的使用者識別碼。
